attributes.action: Release the Home Office's Grooming Gang Review in FULL 2
attributes.additional_details: This review IS in the public's interest, and we the public will not tolerate a government that cowers in the face of the facts.
attributes.background: The Home Office's Review of Grooming Gangs in the UK be made public, without redaction or censoring of information

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300239
